Matt DeMichele Designs

Website Creation | Brand Design | Marketing Strategies

Hey, I'm Matt!

I'm a web developer, marketing strategist, and all-around tech savvy guy. Since 2017, I've been helping small businesses grow their revenues by getting their awesome products found on the internet.

What Can I Do For You?

Here are some of the basic services I offer!

Website Development

I make professional websites using Jekyll and Wordpress, my two favorite web frameworks

E-Commerce

I can monitize your website and bring your awesome product to the internet

Brand Management

I help establish your desired online social presence to increase your name recognition

SEO Optimization

I have the know-how to get your site a #1 ranking in your desired search results

Ongoing Maintenance

I will help keep your website updated, secure, and filled with new content

Site Improvements

Have an old website that needs to be redone? I can make serious improvements on your existing websites
